entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text:
@realDonaldTrump US Covid-19 deaths up BIG, Over 100,000! States reopened should proceed with caution. #TrumpDeathToll100K has fucked us BIGLY! 
We will Transition to Greatness when the diaper-wearing madman is removed from office. There will be kicking & screaming but it will be the best ever!
